statements: SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, account_manager_name FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, integration_key FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, account_manager_email FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, account_manager_email FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id > 5 ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT provider_name, account_manager_name FROM logistics_providers WHERE integration_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT DISTINCT account_manager_email FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY account_manager_email ASC;
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT shipping_address, fulfillment_status FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 2002 AND product_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, fulfillment_status FROM order_details WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM order_details WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 10 AND fulfillment_status = 'Shipping'
SELECT order_id, shipping_address, fulfillment_status FROM order_details WHERE shipping_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY order_id DESC
SELECT order_id, quantity, shipping_address FROM order_details WHERE fulfillment_status = 'Delivered' AND shipping_address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE service_type = 'Express' ORDER BY provider_name
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT provider_name, provider_location, count(order_id) as total_orders FROM logistics_providers LEFT JOIN orders ON orders.customer_id = logistics_providers.provider_id GROUP BY provider_name, provider_location ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 500);
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-07-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31' AND total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'in_progress';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_items GROUP BY order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, products.product_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, tracking_number FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%tech%';
